q: Trade unions and politicians have already accused Sergio Marchionne of "blackmail" in pushing through a tough deal on working conditions at Fiat's flagship Mirafiori plant in Turin to save the factory from closure. Fiat is a great multinational which is growing in the world but its heart remains Italian, Industry Minister Paolo Romani said Saturday, adding, "All arguments are now closed. Romanni had said Monday that he would be asking Sergio Marchionne "to commit to investing in our country and remain with head and heart" in Italy.
